column1: '''Drogoth the Dragon Lord''' is a non-canonical character in ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II]]'' and the sequel ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Battle for Middle-earth II: The Rise of the Witch-king
column2: The Rise of the Witch-king]]''. He is a playable character for the [[Orcs

column1: Drogoth is said to be the lord of all [[dragons]] after the death of [[Smaug]]. In the good campaign, he serves [[Sauron]] in exchange for one of the Dwarven [[Rings of Power]] He can only be attacked by ranged units and siege weapons.
